deal_number.description: The unique identifier for the deal, exactly as shown, including spaces, e.g. '59930 / 60790'.

flow_period_start.description: The first date in the 'Flow Period', separated by a tilde

flow_period_end.description: The second date in the 'Flow Period', separated by a tilde

volume.description: The volume of items or units involved in the transaction. If the number is in parentheses, it means the amount is negative.

price.description: The price per unit involved in the transaction.

amount.description: The invoice amount involved in the transaction. If the amount is put in parenthesis, it means that the amount is negative.

pipeline.description: The pipeline through which the transaction is processed or executed. The pipeline is mentioned in Trade Date / Flow Period / Price Information column.

buy_sell.description: Buy/Sell indicator, is a part of sub header e.g Buy or Sell

invoice_total.description: Total amount of the invoice, can be found at the bottom follow by Total Due To ARC Resources
